info.name: Night Owl for Siteglide
info.description:
Introducing Night Owl for Siteglideâ€”a sleek, dark theme crafted for the nocturnal coder! Gone are the days of squinting at glaring screens. Our theme brings a stylish, eye-soothing darkness that lets you code into the wee hours with comfort. Perfect for developers who thrive under the moonlight, Night Owl transforms your Siteglide interface into a cool, dark canvas. Code more, strain less. Embrace the night with Night Owl for Siteglide!

If you find anywhere in the product that is missing styles, please get in contact with SiteGurus
